examples: These chocolates all look delicious. Whichever shall I choose?

definitions.definition: Irrespective of the one(s) that; no matter which one(s).
examples: Whichever you pick, be content with it.

definitions.definition: Any or either one(s) that; the one(s) that.
examples: I have a few books; please borrow whichever interest you.
They have lots of shirts, but I'll buy whichever is cheapest.
Whichever of you gets here first will get the prize.
I don't mind which you have. Take whichever .

definitions.definition: According to or depending upon which one(s).
examples: I'll buy the red shirt or the blue shirt, whichever is cheaper.

main_definition: ( interrogative ) Which ever ; emphatic form of 'which'.
secondary_definitions: Irrespective of the one(s) that; no matter which one(s).
Any or either one(s) that; the one(s) that.
According to or depending upon which one(s).
